languages.text: "Прекрати этот поток бессмыслицы. Откроешь рот, когда тебе зададут вопрос, и отвечать будешь честно и по делу. Или клянусь {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лексом{/g} я заставлю тебя говорить, точнее то — что от тебя останется после тщательной подготовки к допросу".

traits.locale_text: "Молчать. Будешь говорить, когда прикажут". {n}Рядом с проктором, глухо рыча, скалится пес. Его шерсть забрызгана кровью. Чужой.{/n} "А вопросы у нас к тебе имеются, губернатор".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — or rather, whatever remains of you after I finish preparing you for the interrogation."
languages.original_text: "Прекрати этот поток бессмыслицы. Откроешь рот, когда тебе зададут вопрос, и отвечать будешь честно и по делу. Или клянусь {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лексом{/g} я заставлю тебя говорить, точнее то — что от тебя останется после тщательной подготовки к допросу".

traits.locale_text: "Seven, eight, shut your trap. You may open it when you are asked a question, and your answer better be honest and to the point. Or I swear by the Lex, your execution will involve Glaito gnawing off your limbs, and he can be a very slow gnawer."

"Seven, eight, shut your trap. You may open it when you are asked a question, and your answer better be honest and to the point. Or I swear by the Lex, your execution will involve Glaito gnawing off your limbs, and he can be a very slow gnawer."

"Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — or rather, whatever remains of you after I finish preparing you for the interrogation."

"Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — or rather, whatever remains of you after I finish preparing you for the interrogation."

"Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — or rather, whatever remains of you after I finish preparing you for the interrogation."

"Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — or rather, whatever remains of you after I finish preparing you for the interrogation."

"Seven, eight, shut your trap. You may open it when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, your execution will involve Glaito gnawing off your limbs. And he can be a very slow gnawer."

"Seven, eight, shut your trap. You may open it when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, your execution will involve Glaito gnawing off your limbs. And he can be a very slow gnawer."

"Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — more specifically, whatever remains of you after I am done preparing you for the interrogation."

languages.text: “少说那些没用的废话。从现在开始，闭嘴。只有问你问题的时候，你才可以说话。你的回答最好诚实、扼要，否则我对{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}帝国法典{/g}发誓，我会亲自让你开口。或者说，无论你的身体缺了多少东西，我都能撬开你的嘴巴。”
languages.original_text: "Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — or rather, whatever remains of you after I finish preparing you for the interrogation."

traits.locale_text: “少说那些没用的废话。从现在开始，闭嘴。只有问你问题的时候，你才可以说话。你的回答最好诚实、扼要，否则我对{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}帝国法典{/g}发誓，我会亲自让你开口。或者说，无论你的身体缺了多少东西，我都能撬开你的嘴巴。”
“六七八九十，人渣挨凌迟。从现在开始，闭嘴。只有问你问题的时候，你才可以说话。你的回答最好诚实、扼要，否则我对{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}帝国法典{/g}发誓，我会让格雷托啃光你的四肢，让你流血而死。顺便一提，它知道如何细嚼慢咽。”
“六七八九十，人渣挨凌迟。从现在开始，闭嘴。只有问你问题的时候，你才可以说话。你的回答最好诚实、扼要，否则我对{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}帝国法典{/g}发誓，我会让格雷托啃光你的四肢，让你流血而死。顺便一提，它知道如何细嚼慢咽。”

languages.text: 「くだらない呟きはやめろ。質問されたときだけ口を開け。そして、正直に簡潔に答えた方がいい。さもなくば、{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}レックス{/g}にかけて、お前の口を割らせてやる。いや、尋問の準備が終わったあとの残骸に喋らせることになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — or rather, whatever remains of you after I finish preparing you for the interrogation."

traits.locale_text: 「くだらない呟きはやめろ。質問されたときだけ口を開け。そして、正直に簡潔に答えた方がいい。さもなくば、{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}レックス{/g}にかけて、お前の口を割らせてやる。いや、尋問の準備が終わったあとの残骸に喋らせることになるだろう」
「7、8、黙っていろ。口を開いていいのは、質問されたときだ。そして、正直に簡潔に答えた方がいい、さもなくば、{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}レックス{/g}に誓って、お前の処刑ではグライトに手足を食いちぎってもらうことになるだろう。グライトは、非常にゆっくりと食いちぎることができる」
「7、8、黙っていろ。口を開いていいのは、質問されたときだ。そして、正直に簡潔に答えた方がいい、さもなくば、{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}レックス{/g}に誓って、お前の処刑ではグライトに手足を食いちぎってもらうことになるだろう。グライトは、非常にゆっくりと食いちぎることができる」

languages.text: «Deje esos balbuceos sin sentido. Hable solo para responder a nuestras preguntas. Y más le vale responder de forma clara y sincera, o juro por la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} que le haré confesar, o más bien haré que lo que quede de usted tras preparar el interrogatorio confiese».
languages.original_text: "Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — or rather, whatever remains of you after I finish preparing you for the interrogation."

traits.locale_text: «Deje esos balbuceos sin sentido. Hable solo para responder a nuestras preguntas. Y más le vale responder de forma clara y sincera, o juro por la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} que le haré confesar, o más bien haré que lo que quede de usted tras preparar el interrogatorio confiese».

«Siete, ocho, cierre la boca. Podrá abrirla cuando le pregunten algo. Y más vale que su respuesta sea sincera y concisa, o le juro por la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} que su ejecución consistirá en ordenar a Glaito que le roa los miembros uno por uno. Y le garantizo que puede roer muy despacio».

«Siete, ocho, cierre la boca. Podrá abrirla cuando le pregunten algo. Y más vale que su respuesta sea sincera y concisa, o le juro por la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} que su ejecución consistirá en ordenar a Glaito que le roa los miembros uno por uno. Y le garantizo que puede roer muy despacio».

languages.text: "Anlamsız mırıltılarını kes. Ancak sana soru sorulduğunda konuşabilirsin. Dürüst ve uygun bir cevap vermezsen de... {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}'e yemin olsun ki seni, daha doğrusu seni sorgulamaya hazır hâle getirdiğimde senden geriye ne kaldıysa onu ben konuştururum."
languages.original_text: "Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — or rather, whatever remains of you after I finish preparing you for the interrogation."

traits.locale_text: "Anlamsız mırıltılarını kes. Ancak sana soru sorulduğunda konuşabilirsin. Dürüst ve uygun bir cevap vermezsen de... {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex'e{/g} yemin olsun ki seni, daha doğrusu seni sorgulamaya hazır hâle getirdiğimde senden geriye ne kaldıysa onu ben konuştururum."

"Yedi, sekiz, kes sesini. Ancak sana soru sorulduğunda konuşabilirsin. Dürüst ve uygun bir cevap vermezsen de... {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex'e{/g} yemin olsun ki Glaito'ya uzuvlarını yedirir, seni böyle infaz ederim. Glaito'nun aceleci bir köpek olmadığını söylemeliyim."

"Yedi, sekiz, kes sesini. Ancak sana soru sorulduğunda konuşabilirsin. Dürüst ve uygun bir cevap vermezsen de... {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex'e{/g} yemin olsun ki Glaito'ya uzuvlarını yedirir, seni böyle infaz ederim. Glaito'nun aceleci bir köpek olmadığını söylemeliyim."

languages.text: « Arrêtez de marmonner des âneries. Vous pourrez parler quand on vous posera des questions. Je vous conseille d'ailleurs d'y répondre honnêtement et sans détour, ou je vous jure sur la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} que je vous ferai parler. Ne vous inquiétez pas, j'ai appris à préserver les cordes vocales lors de mes préparations d'interrogatoires. »
languages.original_text: "Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — or rather, whatever remains of you after I finish preparing you for the interrogation."

traits.locale_text: « Arrêtez de marmonner des âneries. Vous pourrez parler quand on vous posera des questions. Je vous conseille d'ailleurs d'y répondre honnêtement et sans détour, ou je vous jure sur la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} que je vous ferai parler. Ne vous inquiétez pas, j'ai appris à préserver les cordes vocales lors de mes préparations d'interrogatoires. »

« Sept, huit, fermez votre clapet. Vous pourrez l'ouvrir quand on vous posera des questions. Je vous conseille d'ailleurs d'y répondre honnêtement et sans détour, ou je vous jure sur la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} que Glaito participera à votre exécution en vous mâchonnant les membres. Ce qu'il peut le faire très lentement, je vous l'assure. »

« Sept, huit, fermez votre clapet. Vous pourrez l'ouvrir quand on vous posera des questions. Je vous conseille d'ailleurs d'y répondre honnêtement et sans détour, ou je vous jure sur la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} que Glaito participera à votre exécution en vous mâchonnant les membres. Ce qu'il peut le faire très lentement, je vous l'assure. »

languages.text: "Schluss mit Eurem blöden Geschwätz. Ihr könnt reden, wenn Euch eine Frage gestellt wird. Und Eure Antwort sollte aufrichtig sein, sonst – und das schwöre ich beim {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperia{/g} – werde ich Euch zum Reden bringen ... oder das, was von Euch übrig ist, nachdem ich Euch für das Verhör vorbereitet habe."
languages.original_text: "Cease your inane mutterings. You may open your mouth when you are asked a question. And your answer had better be honest and to the point, or I swear by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, I will make you speak — or rather, whatever remains of you after I finish preparing you for the interrogation."

traits.locale_text: "Schluss mit Eurem blöden Geschwätz. Ihr könnt reden, wenn Euch eine Frage gestellt wird. Und Eure Antwort sollte aufrichtig sein, sonst – und das schwöre ich beim Lex Imperia – werde ich Euch zum Reden bringen ... oder das, was von Euch übrig ist, nachdem ich Euch für das Verhör vorbereitet habe."

"Sechs, sieben, stumm geblieben. Ihr dürft reden, wenn Ihr etwas gefragt werdet. Und Eure Antwort sollte ehrlich und präzise sein, oder ich schwöre beim {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}, bei Eurer Hinrichtung wird Glaito Euch die Gliedmaßen abnagen. Und er nagt manchmal sehr langsam."
